page.title: 02EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATION IS VERY GOOD,WITH MATHS, ENGLISH,HISTORY,SCIENCE AND GEOGRAPHY. AT THE SCHOOL I GO TO,THERE ARE 40 PUPILS, WHICH MAYBE SMALL,BUT THE TEACHING IS STILL GOOD. WE DO OUR WORK IN GROUPS OR SINGLY.OUR DESKS ARE PLACED IN A CLASSROOM.ENGLISH TODAY IS CALLED ENGLISH BECAUSE WE LIVE IN ENGLAND.WHEN WE GET TO SECONDARY SCHOOL WHICH COMES AFTER JUNIOR SCHOOL,( THE SECONDRY SCHOOL IN WHITCHURCH IS CALLED TEST-BOURNE SCHOOL)THEY WILL HAVE MANY DIFFERENT LESSONS LIKE HOME-ECONOMICS,DISCOVERY AND WOOD AND PLASTIC WORK.THE WORK WE DO IS SOMETIMES HARD BUT IT CAN BE EASY AS WELL.WE DO A LOT MORE SUBJECTS TODAY THAN THE OLDEN DAYS.
